intro: Ptilophyllum plumosum, commonly known as the velvetleaf or silky leaf plant, is a species of flowering plant in the family Malvaceae. It is characterized by its soft, velvety foliage and showy, pale yellow to orange flowers. The plant is native to tropical and subtropical regions of Africa and Asia. It thrives in moist, well-drained soils and is often found in shaded or semi-shaded environments. Its unique appearance makes it a popular ornamental plant in horticulture.
